com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.server

Interface CheckResult

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CancelledCheckResult, CheckResultV4Based, CheckResultV5Based, CheckResultWithReportContents, FlagExtractionCheckResult

    public interface CheckResult
    The result of a check (see CheckAdapter.check(com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.checksettings.CheckSettings, com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.extraction.CheckInformation, com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.checksettings.DocumentCheckSettings) ).
    To access the issues in the checked document call getReport().

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static CheckResult NULL
      The NULL object for CheckResult.

      • getReportUri

        URI getReportUri()
        Returns:
        A valid report URI or null, if (and exactly if) hasReport() is false.

      • getReport

        Report getReport()
        Returns:
        the report for a checked document. Call hasReport() before getting a report.

      • hasAnnotatedXml

        boolean hasAnnotatedXml()

        URI getAnnotatedXmlUri()

      • getSourceDocument

        Document getSourceDocument()
        Returns:
        the source document for which this check result was generated

      • getCheckId

        int getCheckId()
        Returns:
        the id of the check.

      • hasJsonCheckReport

        boolean hasJsonCheckReport()
        Returns:
        the boolean indicating whether Json check report is generated or not.

      • getJsonCheckReportUri

        URI getJsonCheckReportUri()
        Returns:
        A valid Json report URI or null, if (and exactly if) hasJsonCheckReport() is false.
